author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3470 Can't write session to disk with tomcat : Servlet is destroyed before serialization
Change the log message to DEBUG.
As described in the ticket by Mark Thomas a Servlet/Filter can be unloaded at any time and the application's sessions can stay until the ServletContext is destroyed.

author: mfojtik
